pinyin: Xin1 Min2 zhu3 zhu3 yi4 Ge2 ming4

definition: On New Democracy (1940), by Mao Zedong
pinyin: Xin1 Min2 zhu3 zhu3 yi4 Lun4

sentences.english: Third chapter is the new democracy society harmonious theory of history ponder.
sentences.chinese: 第三章是新民主主义社会和谐的历史思考。

sentences.english: The constitutional government to be promoted is new-democratic constitutional government.
sentences.chinese: 目前准备实行的宪政，应该是新民主主义的宪政。

sentences.english: Labor and Capital relation is crucial in China's new-democratic economy.
sentences.chinese: 劳资关系是新民主主义经济的重要关系之一。

sentences.english: What is the nature of new-democratic culture?
sentences.chinese: 什么是新民主主义的文化呢？

sentences.english: That provides condition for changing gradually from new democratism society to socialism in the future.
sentences.chinese: 为由新民主主义逐步转变到社会主义阶段创造了条件。

sentences.english: These constitute the whole of the new-democratic national economy.
sentences.chinese: 这些，就是新民主主义的全部国民经济。

pinyin: Xin1 Min2 zhu3 zhu3 yi4 Ge2 ming4

definition: old democratic revolution/bourgeois revolution (in Marx-Leninist theory, a prelude to the proletarian revolution)
pinyin: jiu4 min2 zhu3 zhu3 yi4 ge2 ming4

definition: democratic revolution/bourgeois revolution (in Marx-Leninist theory, a prelude to the proletarian revolution)

pinyin: Ma3 ke4 si1 Lie4 ning2 zhu3 yi4

definition: bourgeois revolution (in Marx-Leninist theory, a prelude to the proletarian revolution)
pinyin: zi1 chan3 jie1 ji2 ge2 ming4

definition: United Front (either of the two alliances between the Guomindang and the Communist Party, 1923-1927 and 1937-1945)
